title: Duzzit Power Bleach Toilet Block White, Loo Deodoriser, Cistern Block, Bleach Block x 6 (2 Pack Bundle By FREYPAC®, 12 Blocks Total) (White)
features: Value Twin Pack of 12 Duzzit Power Bleach Toilet Cistern Blocks.
Clean, freshen and shine your toilet with controlled bleach on every flush.
Powerful cleaning action fights built-up stains and bacteria.
Up to 80 Days of Freshness per twin pack of bleach blocks. (Longevity depends on toilet useage and cistern system).
Simply drop the a toilet block into your cistern and let the tablet do the work!
description: Product Description Pop a Duzzit Power Bleach Toilet Block in to your toilet cistern to clean and freshen your loo with every flush. Coming in 2 great value packs of 6 Cistern Blocks each, the toilet blocks have a powerful cleaning action to keep your toilet clean, fresh and sparkling. They are a great and hygienic way to keep your toilet fresh, clean, germ and odour-free. Each Bleach Block should last 5-7 days depending upon the number of flushes and water quality in your toilet which means up to 80 days of Freshness per twin pack, or over 11 weeks. For the best results use The Power Bleach Blocks in tandem with either Bottled Bleach or a Rim Device in your toilet pan to give a total clean cycle. Directions For Use Clean Toilet Including Rim. Remove Toilet Block from Pack. Gently Drop Into Cistern - The Opposite Side to where the handle is located. Keep Wrapper Intact as this will dissolve in the water. Wait for approximately 30 minutes for the block to settle then flush. Wash hands after use. May produce an allergic reaction. Harmful if swallowed. Causes skin irritation. Causes serious eye irritation.
